targets.rawSql:
SELECT f.title AS forum_title, s.title AS subforum_title, s.posts_count
FROM forums f
JOIN subforums s ON f.forum_id = s.forum_id
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM forums AS t2 
    WHERE t2.crawling_date > f.crawling_date
)
ORDER BY s.posts_count DESC;

SELECT
    t1.title,
    t1.topics_count,
    t1.posts_count
FROM forums as t1
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM forums AS t2 
    WHERE t2.crawling_date > t1.crawling_date
)
GROUP BY
    t1.title,
    t1.topics_count,
    t1.posts_count;

SELECT t1.last_post_author, SUM(posts_count) AS total_posts
FROM forums as t1
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM forums AS t2 
    WHERE t2.crawling_date > t1.crawling_date
)
GROUP BY t1.last_post_author
ORDER BY total_posts DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT t1.title, t1.posts_count, t1.topics_count
FROM subforums AS t1
INNER JOIN forums f ON t1.forum_id = f.forum_id AND f.title = 'Biete'
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1
  FROM subforums AS t2
  WHERE t2.crawling_date > t1.crawling_date
)

SELECT t1.title, t1.posts_count, t1.topics_count
FROM subforums AS t1
INNER JOIN forums f ON t1.forum_id = f.forum_id AND f.title = 'Suche'
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1
  FROM subforums AS t2
  WHERE t2.crawling_date > t1.crawling_date
)
SELECT crawling_date, title, posts_count FROM germania.subforums WHERE title = 'Drogen & Medikamente' LIMIT 50
SELECT crawling_date, title, posts_count FROM germania.subforums WHERE title = 'Waren' LIMIT 50
SELECT crawling_date, title, posts_count FROM germania.subforums WHERE title = 'Services' LIMIT 50
SELECT crawling_date, title, posts_count FROM germania.subforums WHERE title = 'Sonstiges' LIMIT 50
